page.title: 16Clothes we wear
page.content: School clothes. In the winter girls wear a school uniform which is a long sleeved blouse and a pinafore which is like a dress or a skirt, and boys wear a long sleeved shirt and trousers. In the summer girls wear a cotton dress or shorts and boys wear shorts and a shirt. Playing clothes. When I go outside I wear a tracksuit and daps or I wear a T.shirt and a skirt. If it is cold I wear a coat, gloves and scarf. If it is very hot I play in my paddling pool and wear my swimming costume or shorts and T.shirt. Best clothes When I go to Mass or go out to lunch I wear my velvet dress and a blouse underneath it. If it is hot I wear a cotton dress and sometimes a cardigan.
